title: Sicario
description: An FBI agent joins a task force to fight Mexican drug cartels, facing moral dilemmas along the way.

title: Heat
description: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: Collateral
description: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

title: Inside Man
description: A tough detective matches wits with a cunning bank robber as a tense hostage crisis unfolds.

title: Zodiac
description: The hunt for the Zodiac Killer intensifies as journalists and police become obsessed with solving the case.

title: Nightcrawler
description: A con man discovers the high-speed world of L.A. crime journalism and becomes dangerously involved in it.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
description: A journalist and a computer hacker investigate a wealthy family's dark secrets.

title: Gone Girl
description: A man becomes the prime suspect in the disappearance of his wife, revealing hidden truths.

title: Primal Fear
description: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and a defense attorney takes on the case that reveals shocking secrets.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A troubled young boy claims he can see dead people, leading a psychologist to uncover a shocking truth.

title: The Imitation Game
description: Alan Turing and his team crack the German Enigma code during World War II, facing personal and professional challenges.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of Facebook's creation, exploring betrayal, ambition, and legal battles.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
description: A chronicle of Freddie Mercury's rise with Queen, his personal struggles, and the band's legendary Live Aid performance.

title: Catch Me If You Can
description: The true story of Frank Abagnale Jr., who successfully performed cons worth millions before his 19th birthday.

title: 127 Hours
description: Aron Ralston becomes trapped by a boulder in an isolated canyon and must take drastic measures to survive.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: The story of John Nash, a brilliant mathematician who struggles with schizophrenia.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: It
description: A group of kids in Derry face off against Pennywise, a shape-shifting clown terrorizing their town.

title: Hereditary
description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing events after the death of their secretive grandmother.

title: A Quiet Place
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

title: It Follows
description: A young woman is followed by a supernatural entity after a sexual encounter, and must find a way to escape it.

title: Get Carter
description: A London gangster returns to his hometown to investigate his brother's suspicious death.

title: No Country for Old Men
description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and takes a suitcase full of money.

title: The Revenant
description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory and struggles under an abusive instructor to achieve greatness.

title: Birdman
description: A washed-up actor, famous for his superhero role, struggles to mount a Broadway play and reclaim his career.

title: The Lighthouse
description: Two lighthouse keepers slowly descend into madness while living on a remote and mysterious island.

title: The Witch
description: A Puritan family encounters forces of evil in the woods beyond their New England farm.

title: Suspiria
description: A darkness swirls at a world-renowned dance company, threatening the lives of a young dancer and her friends.

title: Prison Break
description: Two brothers, one wrongly accused, plan an elaborate escape from a high-security prison.

title: Baby Driver
description: A young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a doomed heist after being coerced into working for a crime boss.

title: Fury
description: A hardened tank crew in World War II faces overwhelming odds as they push into enemy territory.

title: The Hateful Eight
description: Bounty hunters seek shelter during a blizzard, uncovering secrets and hidden agendas.

title: Looper
description: A hired gun faces his future self while working for a crime syndicate in a future ruled by time travel.

title: District 13
description: A cop and a criminal must work together to save a Paris district from a criminal gang.

title: Sin City
description: An exploration of crime and vengeance in a corrupt city through interweaving stories.

title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
description: During the Cold War, a CIA agent and a KGB operative team up on a mission to stop a mysterious criminal organization.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
description: Detective Hercule Poirot investigates a murder aboard a luxurious train filled with suspects.

title: Joker
description: A failed comedian descends into madness and chaos in Gotham City, becoming the iconic villain.
